# removeProperties(_:)

**Type Method**

Removes the given properties from all the records of this type in the Address Book database.

## Declaration

```swift
class func removeProperties(_ properties: [Any]!) -> Int
```

## Parameters

- **properties**: An array of the properties to be removed.

## Return Value

The number of properties successfully removed.

## Discussion

Only custom properties can be removed. This method is not implemented.

## Managing properties

- **addPropertiesAndTypes(_:)**: Adds the given properties to all records of this type in the Address Book database.
- **properties()**: Returns an array of the names of all the properties for this record type in the Address Book database.
- **type(ofProperty:)**: Returns the type for a given property.
